Faces x Samsung

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1518&user=10620> 	

FACES is proud to launch The Beauty Trip, an exciting new campaign in partnership with a global tech leader - Samsung, delivering a digital-first experience where beauty meets innovation.
Shot entirely on the Galaxy S25 Edge, this digital-first campaign delivers exclusive content, and immersive storytelling, setting a new benchmark for how we connect with our community.
Spend 699 AED at FACES and get 10% OFF at Samsung.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1519&user=10620>  this summer. *T&Cs apply.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

A Night of French Beauty and Elegance

chunks.text:
FACES is proud to launch The Beauty Trip, an exciting new campaign in partnership with a global tech leader - Samsung, delivering a digital-first experience where beauty meets innovation.
Shot entirely on the Galaxy S25 Edge, this digital-first campaign delivers exclusive content, and immersive storytelling, setting a new benchmark for how we connect with our community.
Spend 699 AED at FACES and get 10% OFF at Samsung.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1519&user=10620>  this summer. *T&Cs apply.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

A Night of French Beauty and Elegance

Our Kuwait team celebrated French National Day on July 13th at the Radisson Blu Hotel, hosted by Ambassador H.E. Olivier Gauvin. They distributed 500 gifts from our French beauty brands L’Occitane, Givenchy, Make Up For Ever, and FACES. 

Chalhoub Group's logo was featured prominently throughout the event, while Tanagra’s Baccarat and Daum collections were showcased in dedicated display zones, adding a touch of elegance to the evening’s ambiance.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1520&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

Share What You Know, Inspire Others!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1521&user=10620> 	







Got something to share? 

Whether it’s insights, inspiration, or behind-the-scenes stories, your voice belongs on One Chalhoub. 
Start contributing today!

<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1521&user=10620> 	







Got something to share? 

Whether it’s insights, inspiration, or behind-the-scenes stories, your voice belongs on One Chalhoub. 
Start contributing today!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-4-min.png> 	

Protecting Our Data: Use Approved Tools

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/1e81a46f6ae84e89d50604d14850170c898317299.png> 	

To protect our Group’s data, please do not use public platforms (e.g. WeTransfer, Dropbox, Google Drive) for sharing internal, restricted, or confidential information. These services lack security controls.

Use Microsoft SharePoint or OneDrive (linked to your Chalhoub Group email) for secure and compliant file sharing.

If you need help sharing large files, submit a request here 
External Data Sharing Request <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1522&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-6-min.png> 	

Plastic Free July

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1523&user=10620> 	

Week 3: Plastic-Free Lunch Challenge 


Snap a fun or artistic photo or video of your plastic-free lunch and post it here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1523&user=10620> .
Bonus points if you tag a colleague and challenge them to join in!


The most creative entry wins a prize! 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/06-1-min.png> 	

Transform Tuesdays

Transform Tuesdays

Distribution is transforming — empowering our teams to serve wholesale partners with more speed, accuracy, and control.
With unified tools across order management, pricing, and procurement, we’re cutting down delays, improving visibility, and building smoother partnerships.

Join the conversation here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1524&user=10620> .
